document.full_text: the pga tour is considering a change to the end of its season in which players who don't make the fedex cup playoffs would compete for their cards in a series of tournaments.
document.title: pga tour considers change of season-ending format
lines_and_colors: the pga tour is considering a change to the end of its season in which players who don't make the fedex cup playoffs would compete for their cards in a series of tournaments.
